parent_document: Name of the document from which the later PDF is extracted. Also used to put together several parts of the same document once they have been answered.
statement: A sentence which will be displayed at the begining of each tasks of that project. Explains what the user have to do and which concultation this documents refers to.

questions.type: 'radio' for a single answer among several questions, 'checkbox' for several answers among several questions
questions.utterance: Here you ask the question in plain text : 'What is your favorite color ?'

statement: Please help us find how these guys like their bretzels

questions.utterance: What shape of bretzels do you like for breakfast ?
How do you like Bretzels after 8 ?
answers: I don't even like bretzels anyway
